body:
<!--

If it is a bug report:
- make sure you are able to repro it on the latest released version. 
You can install the latest version from https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases
- Search the existing issues.
- Refer to the [FAQ](../docs/FAQ.md).
- Refer to the [known issues](../docs/KNOWNISSUES.md).
- Fill out the following repro template

If it's not a bug, please remove the template and elaborate the issue in your own words.
-->

Steps to reproduce
------------------

```bash
$ powershell
```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```none
Works properly.
```

Actual behavior
---------------

```none
Works only 10-60 seconds and then exit with segmentation fault. 
Doesn't matter if execute cmdlets or just wait.
```
```bash
$ strace64 -p 14649
strace64: Process 14649 attached
futex(0xb84334, FUTEX_WAIT_PRIVATE, 9, NULL) = ?
+++ killed by SIGSEGV +++
```

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable

Name                           Value                                                                                                                 
----                           -----                                                                                                                 
PSVersion                      6.0.0-beta                                                                                                            
PSEdition                      Core                                                                                                                  
GitCommitId                    v6.0.0-beta.4                                                                                                         
OS                             Linux 4.11.0-2-amd64 #1 SMP Debian 4.11.11-1 (2017-07-22)                                                             
Platform                       Unix                                                                                                                  
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}                                                                                               
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3                                                                                                                   
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1                                                                                                               
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```

comments.author: cobbr
comments.body: I have also experienced this problem on Debian 9 and on Kali. Have a suspicion that this is related to #4320. How did you install `libicu55` on Debian 9?

comments.author: emakei
comments.body: I had try two ways. First i had install separated libicu55 and powershell for ubuntu 16.04, second way was as described in README for Debian. Offcourse i had removed libicu55 before install package for Ubuntu 14.04.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @mrDSide Thanks for your report! We don't still support Debian 9. Please continue the discussion in #4320

title: Segmentation fault even do nothing on Debian 9.1
